titleInfo.title: Ted Mack arrives at Berry Field and receives key to the City, Nashville, Tennessee, 1950

mods.identifier: RG 3 4914 Ted Mack arrives key to city 002 in 1950

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: Pictured: Celebrity Ted Mack (3rd from left) at a welcoming reception for him at the Nashville Airport, circa 1950. Ted Mack (1904-1976) was born as William Edward Maguiness in Greeley, Colorado. He was the host of “Ted Mack and the Original Amateur Hour” on radio and television. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.

titleInfo.title: Record Group 3 Metro Davidson County Photographer
